module.name: StdActns
module.short: Defines standard actions to be used in Action Lists in the LCL.

descr.p: stdactns.pas contains TAction descendents which can be used in TActionList for common actions performed using controls. This file is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).
The following components are registered but not displayed on the Lazarus IDE component palette:
Edit Actions
Search Actions
Help Actions
Dialog Actions
File Actions

element.name: THintAction
element.short: THintAction - standard action for dealing with requests for a Hint.

element.name: TEditAction
element.short: The base class for standard editing actions applied to an edit control.

descr.p: TEditAction is a TAction descendant which defines the base class for standard editing actions applied to an edit control. It provides a Control property with the TCustomEdit control where the action is applied. It provides an overridden HandlesTarget method to determine if the action can be applied to a specified control.
Do not create instances of TEditAction. Use one of the descendent classes that implement UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods, like:

element.name: TEditAction.FControl
element.short: Member with the edit control for the editing action.

element.name: TEditAction.SetControl
element.short: Sets the value for the Control property.

element.name: TEditAction.SetControl.AValue
element.short: New value for the Control property.

element.name: TEditAction.Notification
element.short: Handles the notification performed when a component is added to or removed from the class instance.

descr.p: Calls the inherited method on entry. Ensures that the value in the Control member is set to Nil when the component is removed from the class instance.

element.name: TEditAction.Notification.AComponent
element.short: Component for the notification.

element.name: TEditAction.Notification.Operation
element.short: Operation performed for the component.

element.name: TEditAction.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TEditAction.HandlesTarget
element.short: Indicates if the editing action can be used for the specified target control.

descr.p: HandlesTarget is a Boolean function which indicates if the editing action can be applied to the object in Target. The return value is True when:

ul.li: Control and Target are the same object instance, or...
Control is unassigned, and Target is a TCustomEdit descendant.

element.name: TEditAction.HandlesTarget.Result
element.short: True when the action can be applied to the target.

element.name: TEditAction.HandlesTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the target control for the action.

element.name: TEditAction.Control
element.short: The edit control associated with this action.

descr.p: Control is a TCustomEdit property with the control for the standard editing action. Control limits the target for the action to a specific control. Setting a new value for the property causes a free notification to be added or removed as needed for the new property value.

element.name: TEditCut
element.short: Editing action used to cut the selected value in a control to the clipboard.

descr.p: TEditCut is a TEditAction descendant which performs a cut to clipboard editing action for a TCustomEdit control. It re-implements the UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods to use the TCustomEdit type for the affected control.

element.name: TEditCut.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the action for the specified target control.

descr.p: ExecuteTarget is an overridden method used to execute the editing action for the specified target control. It re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
Target is the object instance where the editing action is applied. It is cast to a TCustomEdit type, and its CutToClipboard method is called to perform the editing action.

element.name: TEditCut.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object where the editing action is applied.

element.name: TEditCut.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action.

descr.p: UpdateTarget is an overridden method used to update values in the action based on settings in the specified Target control. UpdateTarget re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.

Target is the object instance examined in the method. It is cast to the TCustomEdit type used in the Control property. The Enabled property is set to True when the control in Target has an active text selection (SelLength is not 0).
UpdateTarget is called from the UpdateActions method in TCustomForm when actions and action lists are updated during an application idle state.

element.name: TEditCut.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the values examined in the method.

element.name: TEditCopy
element.short: Editing action used to copy the selected value in a control to the clipboard.

descr.p: TEditCopy is a TEditAction descendant which performs a copy to clipboard editing action for the selected value in a TCustomEdit control. It re-implements the UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods to use the TCustomEdit type for the affected control.

element.name: TEditCopy.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the action for the specified target control.

descr.p: ExecuteTarget is an overridden method used to execute the editing action for the specified target control. It re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
Target is the object instance where the editing action is applied. It is cast to a TCustomEdit type, and its CopyToClipboard method is called to perform the editing action.

element.name: TEditCopy.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object where the editing action is applied.

element.name: TEditCopy.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action.

descr.p: UpdateTarget is an overridden method used to update values in the action based on settings in the specified Target control. UpdateTarget re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.

Target is the object instance examined in the method. It is cast to the TCustomEdit type used in the Control property. The Enabled property is set to True when the control in Target has an active text selection (SelLength is not 0).
UpdateTarget is called from the UpdateActions method in TCustomForm when actions and action lists are updated during an application idle state.

element.name: TEditCopy.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the values examined in the method.

element.name: TEditPaste
element.short: Editing action used to paste values from the clipboard into the specified control.

descr.p: TEditPaste is a TEditAction descendant which copies the contents of the clipboard editing action into the specified TCustomEdit control. It re-implements the UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods to use the TCustomEdit type for the affected control.

element.name: TEditPaste.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action.

descr.p: UpdateTarget is an overridden method used to update values in the action based on settings in the specified Target control. UpdateTarget re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
UpdateTarget sets the value in Enabled to True when values in the Clipboard includes the CF_TEXT content format.
UpdateTarget is called from the UpdateActions method in TCustomForm when actions and action lists are updated during an application idle state.

element.name: TEditPaste.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with values examined in the method.

element.name: TEditPaste.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the action for the specified target control.

descr.p: ExecuteTarget is an overridden method used to execute the editing action for the specified target control. It re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
Target is the object instance where the editing action is applied. It is cast to a TCustomEdit type, and its PasteFromClipboard method is called to perform the editing action.

element.name: TEditPaste.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance where the editing action is applied.

element.name: TEditSelectAll
element.short: Editing action used to select all of the content in the value for the specified control.

descr.p: TEditSelectAll is a TEditAction descendant which selects all of the content in the value for the specified TCustomEdit control. It re-implements the UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods to use the TCustomEdit type for the affected control.

element.name: TEditSelectAll.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the action for the specified target control.

descr.p: ExecuteTarget is an overridden method used to execute the editing action for the specified target control. It re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
Target is the object instance where the editing action is applied. It is cast to a TCustomEdit type, and its SelectAll method is called to perform the editing action.

element.name: TEditSelectAll.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance where the editing action is applied.

element.name: TEditSelectAll.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action.

descr.p: UpdateTarget is an overridden method used to update values in the action based on settings in the specified Target control. UpdateTarget re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.

Target is the object instance with values examined in the method. It is cast to the TCustomEdit type used in the Control property, and its Text property is checked for an existing text value. UpdateTarget sets the value in Enabled to True when Text is not an empty string ('').
UpdateTarget is called from the UpdateActions method in TCustomForm when actions and action lists are updated during an application idle state.

element.name: TEditSelectAll.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with values examined in the method.

element.name: TEditUndo
element.short: Editing action used to Undo the previous change to the value for the specified control.

descr.p: TEditUndo is a TEditAction descendant which reverses the previous change to the value for the specified TCustomEdit control. It re-implements the UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods to use the TCustomEdit type for the affected control.

element.name: TEditUndo.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the action for the specified target control.

descr.p: ExecuteTarget is an overridden method used to execute the editing action for the specified target control. It re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
Target is the object instance where the editing action is applied. It is cast to a TCustomEdit type, and its Undo method is called to perform the editing action.

element.name: TEditUndo.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance where the editing action is applied.

element.name: TEditUndo.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action.

descr.p: UpdateTarget is an overridden method used to update values in the action based on settings in the specified Target control. UpdateTarget re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.

Target is the object instance with values examined in the method. It is cast to the TCustomEdit type used in the Control property, and its CanUndo method is called to get the value assigned to the Enabled property.
UpdateTarget is called from the UpdateActions method in TCustomForm when actions and action lists are updated during an application idle state.

element.name: TEditUndo.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the values examined in the method.

element.name: TEditDelete
element.short: Editing action used to remove the current selection in the specified control.

descr.p: TEditDelete is a TEditAction descendant which removes the current selected text for the specified TCustomEdit control. It re-implements the UpdateTarget and ExecuteTarget methods to use the TCustomEdit type for the affected control.

element.name: TEditDelete.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the action for the specified target control.

descr.p: ExecuteTarget is an overridden method used to execute the editing action for the specified target control. It re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.
Target is the object instance where the editing action is applied. It is cast to a TCustomEdit type, and its ClearSelection method is called to perform the editing action.

element.name: TEditDelete.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance where the editing action is applied.

element.name: TEditDelete.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action.

descr.p: UpdateTarget is an overridden method used to update values in the action based on settings in the specified Target control. UpdateTarget re-implements the method introduced in the ancestor class.

Target is the object instance with values examined in the method. It is cast to the TCustomEdit type used in the Control property, and sets Enabled to True when text is currently selected in the control.
UpdateTarget is called from the UpdateActions method in TCustomForm when actions and action lists are updated during an application idle state.

element.name: TEditDelete.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with values examined in the method.

element.name: THelpAction
element.short: The base class for standard help actions.

descr.p: THelpAction is a TAction descendant which implements the base class for help actions. It is used as the ancestor for classes including: THelpContents, THelpTopicSearch, THelpOnHelp , and THelpContextAction.

element.name: THelpAction.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Calls the inherited constructor.

element.name: THelpAction.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance.

element.name: THelpAction.HandlesTarget
element.short: Determines whether the help action can be applied to the Target control.

descr.p: Calls the inherited method.

element.name: THelpAction.HandlesTarget.Result
element.short: True if the action can be applied to the target control.

element.name: THelpAction.HandlesTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the control examined in the method.

element.name: THelpAction.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the action using values in the target control.

descr.p: Calls the inherited method.

element.name: THelpAction.UpdateTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with values examined in the method.

element.name: THelpContents
element.short: Help action used to display a Table of Contents for the HelpContext.

element.name: THelpContents.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the help action for the HelpContext.

descr.p: Calls the inherited method.

element.name: THelpContents.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the context for the help action.

element.name: THelpTopicSearch
element.short: Help action used to search for a help topic.

element.name: THelpTopicSearch.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the help action for the help context.

element.name: THelpTopicSearch.ExecuteTarget.Target
element.short: Object instance with the help context.

element.name: THelpOnHelp
element.short: Help action used to display the Help on Help topic, or "How to Get Help".

element.name: THelpOnHelp.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the help action.

element.name: THelpContextAction
element.short: Help action used to get help for a specific help context.

element.name: THelpContextAction.ExecuteTarget
element.short: Executes the help action.

element.name: THelpContextAction.UpdateTarget
element.short: Updates the enabled state for the help action.

element.name: TCommonDialogClass
element.short: Class reference for the TCommonDialog type.

descr.p: Contains the class reference used to create new dialog instances in TCommonDialogAction. TCommonDialogClass is the type returned from the GetDialogClass method in TCommonDialogAction.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction
element.short: Dialog action used to create, configure, and display a dialog.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.FDialog
element.short: FDialog - local variable holding the Dialog associated with this action.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.DoAccept
element.short: DoAccept - perform the code for the OnAccept event.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.DoBeforeExecute
element.short: Performs the BeforeExecute notification when assigned.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.DoCancel
element.short: DoCancel - perform the code for the OnCancel event.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.GetDialogClass
element.short: GetDialogClass - returns the class type for the dialog associated with this action.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.CreateDialog
element.short: Create a new instance of the class type used in the Dialog property.

descr.p: Calls GetDialogClass to get the class reference used to create the dialog instance. When assigned, it is created and stored in the Dialog property. It Name is set to the ClassName for the class reference, and it is marked as a sub-component for the class instance.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited method on entry. Create calls CreateDialog to create and configure a new instance of the dialog class type used in the implementation. It sets the value in Enabled to True.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.ExecuteResult
element.short: ExecuteResult - the result of the execution: True if successful.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.BeforeExecute
element.short: BeforeExecute - event handler for performance before execution of the action.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.OnAccept
element.short: OnAccept - event handler for a press of the Accept button.

element.name: TCommonDialogAction.OnCancel
element.short: OnCancel - event handler for a press of the Cancel button.

element.name: TFileAction
element.short: TFileAction - base class for providing actions associated with various file dialogs and menu options.

element.name: TFileAction.GetFileName
element.short: Gets the value for the FileName property.

element.name: TFileAction.GetFileName.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TFileAction.SetFileName
element.short: Sets the value for the FileName property.

element.name: TFileAction.SetFileName.AValue
element.short: New value for the property.

element.name: TFileAction.GetDialog
element.short: GetDialog - returns a TOpenDialog for use in this File action.

element.name: TFileAction.GetDialog.Result
element.short: TOpenDialog instance used in the class.

element.name: TFileAction.FileName
element.short: File name returned from the dialog in the action.

descr.p: FileName is a TFileName property with the file name returned in the Open dialog for the action.

element.name: TFileOpen
element.short: TFileOpen - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Open menu option.

element.name: TFileOpen.GetDialog
element.short: Gets the value for the Dialog property.

element.name: TFileOpen.GetDialog.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TFileOpen.GetDialogClass
element.short: Gets the class reference used to create the Dialog for the action.

element.name: TFileOpen.GetDialogClass.Result
element.short: TCommonDialogClass reference used to create the Dialog.

element.name: TFileOpen.Dialog
element.short: The Open Dialog to be used with this action.

descr.p: Dialog is a read-only TOpenDialog property with the dialog used to select a file for the File Open action.

element.name: TFileOpen.UseDefaultApp
element.short: Indicates if the default application should be used to open the file for the action.

descr.p: UseDefaultApp is a Boolean property which indicates if the default application should be used to open the selected FileName. The default value for the property is False.
descr.remark: UseDefaultApp is not used in the current LCL version.

element.name: TFileOpenWith
element.short: TFileOpenWith - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Open With menu option.

descr.p: TFileOpenWith is a standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Open With menu option. Gives the User an opportunity to choose the application with which to open a file.

element.name: TFileOpenWith.FileName
element.short: File name for the Open With action.
element.descr: FileName is a TFileName property with the file name used in the Open With action.

element.name: TFileOpenWith.AfterOpen
element.short: AfterOpen - event handler to be performed after file is opened.

element.name: TFileSaveAs
element.short: TFileSaveAs - standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Save As menu option.

descr.p: TFileSaveAs is a standard action (including opening a dialog) associated with the File Save As menu option. Gives the user an opportunity to select or enter a name to use for saving the file.

element.name: TFileSaveAs.GetSaveDialog
element.short: Gets the value for the Dialog property.

element.name: TFileSaveAs.GetSaveDialog.Result
element.short: Value for the Dialog property.

element.name: TFileSaveAs.Dialog
element.short: The Save Dialog to be used with this action.

element.name: TFileExit
element.short: TFileExit - standard action (closing file and terminating application) associated with the File Exit menu option.

element.name: TSearchAction
element.short: TSearchAction - base class for the actions associated with the various Search menu options.

element.name: TSearchAction.FControl
element.short: FControl - local variable holding the control for use with this action.

element.name: TSearchAction.CreateDialog
element.short: Creates the class instance used in the Dialog property.

descr.p: Calls the inherited CreateDialog method, and assigns the Search method as the OnFind event handler in Dialog.

element.name: TSearchAction.Notification
element.short: Handles notifications when a control in the class instance is added or removed.

element.name: TSearchAction.Notification.AComponent
element.short: Component for the notification.

element.name: TSearchAction.Notification.Operation
element.short: Operation for the notification.

element.name: TSearchAction.UpdateControl
element.short: Updates the internal Control to the value in NewControl.

element.name: TSearchAction.UpdateControl.NewControl
element.short: New value for the internal Control.

element.name: TSearchAction.PerformSearch
element.short: Performs the seach action using the Dialog options.

descr.p: Performs the search action using the options and search criteria set in the Dialog property. Called from the Search method.

element.name: TSearchAction.PerformSearch.Result
element.short: True when the search value is found in the text for the internal Control.

element.name: TSearchAction.ShowNotFound
element.short: Displays a dialog with a "Not Found" message.

element.name: TSearchAction.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Calls the inherited constructor, and sets the value for the internal Control to Nil.

element.name: TSearchAction.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner for the class instance.

element.name: TSearchAction.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Removes the free notification for the internal Control (when assigned), and calls the inherited destructor.

element.name: TSearchAction.Search
element.short: Performs the Search action.

element.name: TSearchFind
element.short: TSearchFind - the action associated with a Search and Find dialog (as opposed to search and replace).

descr.p: Returns the TFindDialog class type in TSearchFind.

element.name: TSearchFind.GetDialogClass.Result
element.short: Returns TFindDialog for the action.

element.name: TSearchFind.Dialog
element.short: The FindDialog to be used with this action.

element.name: TSearchReplace
element.short: TSearchReplace - action associated with the Search and Replace menu option and dialogs.

element.name: TSearchReplace.Replace
element.short: Replace - the method to perform the Replace action once the specified text has been found.

element.name: TSearchReplace.Dialog
element.short: The ReplaceDialog to be used with this action.

element.name: TSearchFindFirst
element.short: TSearchFindFirst - Search action to find the first match.

element.name: TSearchFindNext
element.short: TSearchFindNext - search action to find the next match.

element.name: TSearchFindNext.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TSearchFindNext.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance.

element.name: TSearchFindNext.Notification
element.short: Handles notifications when a component used in the class instance is added or removed.

element.name: TSearchFindNext.SearchFind
element.short: The SearchFind action to use for searching.

element.name: TFontEdit
element.short: TFontEdit - standard action for opening a Font Edit dialog.

element.name: TFontEdit.GetDialog
element.short: Gets the value for the Dialog property.

element.name: TFontEdit.GetDialog.Result
element.short: Value for the property.

element.name: TFontEdit.Dialog
element.short: The FontDialog to use for this action.

element.name: TColorSelect
element.short: TColorSelect - standard action for opening a Color Selection dialog.

element.name: TColorSelect.Dialog
element.short: The ColorDialog to use with this action.

element.name: Register
element.short: Registers component for use in the Lazarus IDE.

descr.p: The following components are registered but not displayed on the Lazarus IDE component palette:
Edit Actions
Search Actions
Help Actions
Dialog Actions
File Actions
